comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: The caption should be Retvizan en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_battleship_Retvizan She was sunk in 1905, later to be raised by Japan and rebuilt as Hizen

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Kilted Cowboy: Thanks for the correction.  We'll fix the description next time we update.
